name: Dinosaurs Hunter: Wild Safari
description:
Dinosaurs Hunter: Wild Safari is super addictive animals hunt game to improve huntsman's hunts skills.Aim dino accurately to shoot the wild animals and get real hunting experience in a safari jungle 3D environment. Enjoy the latest bow and crossbow hunt game by shooting dinosaur animals.
Features :

- The incredible Jurassic jungle, open to explore!
- High Quality graphics
- Unique hunting weapons and accessories
- 3D bloody dinosaurs, from the Herbivorous to Carnivorous
- Immersive hunting missions to complete
- Map and radar to locate and track dinosaurs
